name: Tulsa Aviation Group, LLC
about: Tulsa Aviation Group, LLC, located at the Claremore Regional Airport, is a distinguished flight school recognized by the Aircraft Owners and Pilots Association (AOPA) for its high standards in flight training. Since its inception in 2014, TAG has been committed to providing premier pilot training and aircraft rental services in Northeastern Oklahoma. The school offers a range of training programs, including Private Pilot, Instrument, Commercial, and Certified Flight Instructor certifications, all exceeding FAA minimums to include real-world training. With a focus on personal attention and community integration, TAG has created a family-like environment that helps students become lifelong pilots. Now enrolling students for Private Pilot Ground School, TAG continues to pride itself on its exceptional training and dedication to aviation excellence.
services:
["Biennial Flight Review
Ground School
Instrument Proficiency Check
Intro Flight
Commercial
Flight Instructor CFI
Flight Instructor Instrument CFII
Private Pilot
Instrument"]
